Class Vector

  • java.lang.Object
    • gui.Vector

  • public class Vector
extends java.lang.Object

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Vector()
      Constructs a vector with values <0,0>
      Vector(double x, double y)
      Constructs a vector with the given inputs
      Vector(Vector v)
      Constructs a vector with the same values as the input vector

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Adds vector v's components to this vector.

      Returns this vector's x component

      Returns this double's y component
      Vector invert()
      Inverts both of this' components - changes the vector to <1/x, 1/y> Returns a reference to itself
      double length()
      Returns the length of this vector
      double magnitude()
      Returns the length of this vector
      Vector mult(double scalar)
      Multiplies both of this vector's components by the given scalar Returns a reference to itself
      java.lang.String toString() 
      Vector unit()
      Makes this vector have length 1, with the same direction.
